Jann, could you please write down which files are affected by your patch in 1.2.x?

- default/config/menues/generic.xsp
- info/overview.xsp
- ??
creator: roku@apache.org
jann.forrer@id.unizh.ch
text:
The following files are affected by the patch: 
 
Changes in lenya source 
------------------------------------- 
- org/apache/lenya/cms/cocoon/acting/DefaultCreatorAction.java 
   -> update the addnode method in order to integrate the attribute if a document is 
created 
 
- org/apache/lenya/cms/authoring/DocumentCreator.java 
   -> update the addnode method 
 
- org/apache/lenya/cms/ant/TreePublisher.java 
 
- org/apache/lenya/cms/ant/ChangeVisibilityTask.java 
    -> a new java class 
 
- org/apache/lenya/cms/ant/DocumentCreatorTask.java 
   -> basically add two new methods: setVisibleInNav and getVisibleInNav 
 
- org/apache/lenya/cms/publication/SiteTree.java 
- org/apache/lenya/cms/publication/SiteTreeNode.java 
  -> defining two new methods:    
       boolean visibleInNav(); and 
       void setNodeAttribute (String attributeName, String attributeValue); 
 
- org/apache/lenya/cms/publication/SiteTreeNodeImpl.java 
 
- org/apache/lenya/cms/publication/DefaultSiteTree.java 
 
- org/apache/lenya/cms/publication/AbstractPublication.java 
 
- lenya/xslt/info/change-visibility.xsl 
   -> new xslt style sheet 
 
- lenya/xslt/info/info.xsl 
    -> Adding a visiblity entry to the overview tab in the site area 
 
- lenya/xslt/navigation/menu.xsl 
 
- lenya/usecase.xmap 
 
 
Publication specific changes: 
--------------------------------------------- 
- lenya/pubs/default/config/tasks/tasks.xconf 
- lenya/pubs/default/config/tasks/targets.xml 
- lenya/pubs/default/config/menus/generic.xsp 
- lenya/pubs/default/lenya/xslt/authoring/create.xsl 
- lenya/resources/i18n/cmsui_de.xml 
 
HTH. Let me know if can help you in some way or if you need more informations ... 
 
Jann

still TODO:
